newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesia. Mauritius sign double taxation accord.
newsitem.headline: Indonesia. Mauritius sign double taxation accord.

text.p: Indonesian Foreign Minister Ali Alatas and the finance minister of Mauritius, Jacques Chasteaau de Balyon, signed an agreement on Tuesday on the avoidance of double taxation and tax dodging between their two countries.
The Indonesian Foreign Ministry said in a statement the agreement would expand and deepen economic relations between the two countries.
The two ministers are taking part in the annual ministerial meeting of the 54-member Organisation of the Islamic Conference (OIC) in Jakarta.
